DOC.brief_summary: Remote ischemic precondition proven beneficial patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention coronary artery bypass surgery . Animal study suggest remote ischemic preconditioning increase level interleukin 10 . The investigator aim determine whether remote ischemic preconditioning result increase IL-10 level patient follow acute myocardial infarction .
DOC.brief_title: IL-10 Levels Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.criteria: Acute myocardial infarction Cardiogenic shock Active ischemia
